text:
Hi Everyone,

I have 4+ year of experience in HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

I am new to HubSpot CMS and I am trying to learn though the Courses on HubSpot.

Can anyone help me with which courses should I go through one by one From Basic to Advance.

Thanks

Hello Parth! Nice to meet you, my name is Brooke Fisher, and I'm one of the Developer Professors with HubSpot Academy. I'm excited that you would like to learn more about developing with the HubSpot CMS. Here are some courses for you
• <https://app.HubSpot.com/academy/19931632/lessons/673/3414|HubSpot CMS themes quickstart for developers lesson>
• <https://app.HubSpot.com/academy/19931632/lessons/374/2042|Blog, Email, and System Templates in the HubSpot CMS lesson>
• <https://app.HubSpot.com/academy/19931632/lessons/756/3877|Extending Your Website Using Serverless Functions in HubSpot> (this is a non-technical look at how serverless functions work with the HubSpot CMS & various use cases)
• <https://app.HubSpot.com/academy/19931632/tracks/121/|HubSpot CMS for Developers certification> (get HubSpot CMS certified!)
• <https://app.HubSpot.com/academy/19931632/tracks/71/592/2963|Introduction to the HubSpot APIs course> (this isn't directly related to the CMS, but it's good to know how to work the HubSpot APIs)
